page.title: 19TOURISM- ON ILKLEY MOOR
page.content: The moorland area around the{Cow and {Calf Rocks}is a very famous and popular tourist spot.It offers various attractions to people with differing pastimes and pursuits. The varied scenery and wildlife of the area attract thousands of tourists who explore the many footpaths. The area of rocky valley offers probably the finest gritstone outcrop for{rock climbers}in Britain.This is where mountaineers like Don Whillans and Joe Brown cut their teeth. In more recent years new sports have been seen in the area.These include {fell running, orienteering}and{hang {gliding. It is also used by many{schools}and {colleges}as a{field study centre}of outstanding{ecological}and {archaeological}interest.
